title: Curtain, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave, float weave, grouped warps and wefts
description: Monochrome continuous pattern of closely spaced vertical vines with leaves and blossoms. In recent years, this panel has been piece-dyed yellow.
